mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS attendance_id, a.user_id, u.full_name, a.session_date, a.status FROM attendance a JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id;

WITH score_calc AS ( SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.full_name,
SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'PRESENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS present_count, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'ABSENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS absent_count, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status IN ('LATE', 'LEAVE_EARLY') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late_early_count, FLOOR(SUM(CASE WHEN a.status IN ('LATE', 'LEAVE_EARLY') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / 3) AS late_penalty FROM user u LEFT JOIN attendance a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.full_name ) SELECT full_name, present_count, (present_count - absent_count - late_penalty) AS final_score, DENSE_RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY (present_count - absent_count - late_penalty) DESC ) AS ranking FROM score_calc ORDER BY ranking, full_name;
